publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2248.1.1 Ben Wallace: Care Development Group-As an amendment to the amendment to motion (S1M-2248.1) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end "but urges the Scottish Executive to implement the recommendation of Sir Stuart Sutherland for the "pooling" of budgets and put in place systems to ensure that funds allocated for community care are actually spent on such services."
